description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science pursuing a degree in the Department of Engineering Physics. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Mechanical Engineering major 3.0 GPA or above Two faculty recommendations

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Engr Physics-Mechanical Engr   or SIS_Major_2 is Mechanical Engineering   or SIS_Major_2 is Engineering Physics-Mechan Sys   or SIS_Major is Engr Physics-Mechanical Engr   or SIS_Major is Mechanical Engineering   or SIS_Major is Engineering Physics-Mechan Sys
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Engr Physics-Mechanical Engr   or SIS_Major_2 is Mechanical Engineering   or SIS_Major_2 is Engineering Physics-Mechan Sys   or SIS_Major is Engr Physics-Mechanical Engr   or SIS_Major is Mechanical Engineering   or SIS_Major is Engineering Physics-Mechan Sys
criteria.clean_description: Major: Engineering Physics-Mechan Sys, Engr Physics-Mechanical Engr, Mechanical Engineering
